quest.name: A Good Adventurer Is Hard to Find
journal: Bernadette is searching for adventurers eager to prove their mettle.
Bernadette informs you that the Gods' Quiver is seeking ambitious adventurers to assist them, and encourages you to present yourself before Chansteloup outside the Archers' Guild.
Though skeptical, Chansteloup is willing to offer you an opportunity to prove your worth.

dialogue.name: BERNADETTE
dialogue.text: Newly come to Gridania, are you? In search of fame and fortune, perhaps?

dialogue.name: BERNADETTE
dialogue.text: If you have confidence in your abilities, I urge you to speak with Chansteloup of the Gods' Quiver. You can find him standing vigil before the Archers' Guild.

dialogue.name: BERNADETTE
dialogue.text: The creatures of the Twelveswood have been behaving most unnaturally of late, and it has fallen to the Gods' Quiver to pacify them. Alas, they are sorely undermanned.

dialogue.name: BERNADETTE
dialogue.text: For this reason, they seek able adventurers to supplement their ranks. I am certain that your offer of aid would be well received.

dialogue.name: CHANSTELOUP
dialogue.text: Bernadette sent you to me? Hmph!

dialogue.name: CHANSTELOUP
dialogue.text: Well, inexperienced or not, if you wish to prove your worth to the people of Gridania, you were right to come.

dialogue.name: CHANSTELOUP
dialogue.text: You do wish to prove yourself, do you not?
